name: Muri (itch)
description:
Muri is a short game exploring the theme of "Heart of The Forest" .
We wanted to take the approach of the deep forest and apply it to the depths of our own heart, explore the  side of ourselves we hide deep within ourselves. 

I hope you enjoy the prototype 

Controls - 
WASD - Navigate
Space - Jump
F - interact

(the interaction with the mirror in this current build is a bit faulty, we will try to fix this as soon as we can) 

Art - Fabi
Code - Michael
Audio Credit goes to  Royalty Free Music from Bensound at www.bensound.com

Details: We are a team of two developers and started this project with the start of the game Jam. Everything was made in the designated game jam timespan
